descriptions:
BRENNAN
"He was the servant of the sun."

BRENNAN
"He's your grandfather because I took some of his blood
"and I used it for a spell, and I made a wish,
"and my wish was to have a child."

BRENNAN
"Aetheon,
"without the god of the sun, he went feral.
"He'd lost his connection to his maker.

BRENNAN
You enter and see the Lady Aranessa Royce,
who you saw yesterday at the funeral.

BRENNAN
"I'm Lady Aranessa Royce.
"Welcome to the Palazzo Davinos.
"This is the house of my vassal, Lord Raimond.

BRENNAN
"My family has a castle in the Golden Orchard
"halfway between our world and Faerie and it is dying.

MATT
My lady is shaken.

LUIS
Azune Nayar stands tall, proud.

LUIS
Human in appearance, he is just over 5'10", but gives the presence of someone that's taller than that.

LUIS
His pride carries him above his height.

LUIS
He is strong, lean, muscular.

LUIS
He has medium brown skin and coppery auburn brown hair that's tied back in a braid, a birthmark that goes up the right side of his neck, up his face, and up to his forehead around his eye.

LUIS
His eyes look like a sunset on an ocean.

LUIS
The bottom half of his irises are a deep blue.

LUIS
His pupils are yellow like the sun that bursts out into an orange and then into a teal and then into a light gray.

LUIS
He's wearing full armor, as is given to him by his station in Dol-Makjar.

LUIS
He is a member of the Revolutionary Guard, an Arcane Marshal, specifically.

LUIS
His arms are exposed.

LUIS
Along his right bicep are tattooed the words: Have mercy on those I send you.

BRENNAN
You have an Arcane Marshal here, and I think, you know, Teor, the last time you saw Azune he was one of the younger people in you and Thjazi's battalion.

My focus right now is so split
because I'm running in my mind,
I do still have pieces of Thjazi,
just flashes of the last look on his face and his body,
but I also have now this lord knight
that came to speak to me at the Brethren Hall,
and the look behind his eyes
and that intent in his voice and that hunger,

My word, it is looking lovely and everybody is working
and it is just delightful.

I will not put anything that has the word leather
in my mouth and swallow it. That's disgusting.

you see that he has what looks to be a twin brother

a ruff as well.

rough, silk shirt wearing guy

you see scratching a head
that moves from skin into
crystal
with a fire burning in the skull is this tailor

BRENNAN
"We attempt to make clear
"that violence is always a regrettable, tragic,

"It is such an exciting proposition to imagine,

BRENNAN
"Iris loves the whole Creed.

BRENNAN
"The Creed is--"
"-- exactly what we need it to be."

BRENNAN
"Exactly, and a smith looking at a hammer and saying,

brought me to you

It was Casimir.

Casimir betrayed everybody.
He's the one that broke into the hideout.

"Cas has been on the gibbet for a moment.
"That's our list

"He worked at a place called Underwallen & Sisters.

BRENNAN
"He worked putting

BRENNAN

this is The Guard Tower.

Cyd.

BRENNAN
This moment, you stand shoulder to shoulder with the people you stand shoulder to shoulder with the people of the city of Dol-Makjar, its gray stone standing proud here at the eastern edge of the land known as Kahad.

BRENNAN
Under their arms stands the base of this massive wall at the eastern edge of the city, Dol-Makjar, towering spires that follow the River Vrosh step-by-step down from the mountains.

BRENNAN
Dol-Makjar is Chicago.

BRENNAN
This is the seat of the revolution after all, but.

BRENNAN
This city that was the shield of Kahad
during long centuries that stood as the shields
to the orcish homeland against the mountain dwarves
to their east, to the humans to their north,
at a time ruled by the Shapers.

BRENNAN
Now it beholds a metropolis,
a place where all peoples united in revolution
and rebellion against the gods,
can sing and trade, dance and perform magic.

BRENNAN
In the midst you see here,
your brother Ethrand
your brother Ethrand

holding in his hand

wings surrounding it.

but you realize that some kind of bright light fluid

you see these two stunted naked wings

White eagle's wings.

BRENNAN
The Guardian Wall, like much of Dol-Makjar, is a place dedicated to heroism, camaraderie, the struggle of the mortal world to make a brighter day.

My name is Halandil Fang, Hal.

LIAM
I am a older, dark-haired with streaks of white orc gentleman dressed in fairly fine, but not ostentatious clothing and has smile lines at the eyes from a life well lived.

LIAM
Hal is not a man of deep pockets or wealth, but he lives happily and comfortably in this home with its view of the river and my theater down below at the foot of the hill.

I haven't held a sword,
a real sword with purpose since I was a young man.
The only blades I've held in my hand
have been stage props for several decades.

gnarled, twisted cedar tree that is extreme-looking,

For centuries before the fall of the Shapers,
this was a place where our god, our Shaper,

exalting in ecstatic fervent ritual
unto our keeper.

now we come to celebrate each other.

and trailing behind her is your sister, Tyranny; Cruelty.
